results.content: I can barely understand the lecturer. I had to turn on the captions because I can barely hear what he is saying, even if the audio is all the way up. It is unclear what I am learning or what he clicks on because he zooms in all the way; I can't quite see what he's clicking on, or the rest of the page. Also, I have no idea what a Personal CV is; he didn't go over what each type of website is for. Quite confusing.

results.content: This is the best online free course I have come across. It's easy, nicely explained and supported by good practical examples . The dynamic page and database creation section was very cool. I did not know one can do all  that with Wix. Good job!
